attributes.action: Support the people of St Helena and other Overseas Territories
attributes.additional_details:
The people of St Helena and other Overseas Territories continue to be ignored by the Government in London.

They are not given democratic representation in the UK, and successive Governments have failed to support these British citizens with investment, educational opportunities and economic development.

This petition calls for an urgent working group to be set up to better support the people of St Helena and other Overseas Territories that currently exist despite the UK Government, rather than with the help of their fellow citizens.
